Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: The teacher is the one marking it, so even if what they say is nonsensical, that is how it will be marked so more relevant. AI will sometimes give suggestions for different marking criteria (eg suggesting first person for a scientific report based on it being the preferred format for a creative story)

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI feels safer - I can ask stupid questions without being worried about its opinion etc.
